lead_paragraph: The singer known as Antony, a gown-clad man with a striking alto voice, joined the Orchestra of St. Luke’s at Lincoln Center’s White Light Festival.
snippet: The singer known as Antony, a gown-clad man with a striking alto voice, joined the Orchestra of St. Luke’s at Lincoln Center’s White Light Festival.

headline.main: Fluid Voice With a Fluid Persona Firmly Attached
headline.seo: Antony and Orchestra of St. Luke’s at Avery Fisher - Review
